title: BBC moves its China correspondent to Taiwan as tensions with Beijing grow
content:
1. BBC moves its China correspondent to Taiwan as tensions with Beijing grow  CNN
  2. BBC reporter John Sudworth hides in Taiwan island after Xinjiang individuals plan to sue BBC for fake news: source  Global Times
  3. The BBC moved its China correspondent to Taiwan after Beijing attacked him for reporting on the Uyghurs  Business Insider
  4. BBC journalist leaves China after Beijing criticises Uighurs coverage  The Guardian
  5. BBC China Reporter Sudsworth Leaves Beijing for Taipei After Criticism  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
BBC moves its China correspondent to Taiwan as tensions with Beijing grow  CNN 
BBC reporter John Sudworth hides in Taiwan island after Xinjiang individuals plan to sue BBC for fake news: source  Global Times
The BBC moved its China correspondent to Taiwan after Beijing attacked him for reporting on the Uyghurs  Business Insider
BBC journalist leaves China after Beijing criticises Uighurs coverage  The Guardian
BBC China Reporter Sudsworth Leaves Beijing for Taipei After Criticism  Bloomberg

localize.title: 英国广播公司（BBC）将其驻华记者调到台湾，因为与北京的关系越来越紧张。
英國廣播公司（BBC）將其駐華記者調到臺灣，因爲與北京的關係越來越緊張。
